desc: Mobile devices have evolved to focus on rich media production and consumption. Developers of mobile applications are able to create applications that allow people to play, capture, and share media in a variety of new ways on mobile devices. The popularity of Android has soared in part because the platform offers developers a rich set of capabilities including access to media capturing and playback functions.
title: Pro Android Media: Developing Graphics, Music, Video, and Rich Media Apps for Smartphones and Tablets
